item.title: 联邦快递货运分拆计划强化核心业务，促进行业发展
item.description: 分析师周五表示，联邦快递分拆货运卡车业务部门的决定将加强该业务，同时使这家包裹递送巨头能够更好地应对其核心业务面临的挑战。【原文：FedEx's decision to spin off its freight truckload segment will strengthen the business while allowing the parcel delivery giant to better tackle challenges in its core operations, analysts said on Friday.】

item.title: 意大利因 OpenAI 违反隐私保护规定罚款 1500 万欧元
item.description: 意大利隐私监管机构周五表示，在结束对生成式人工智能应用程序使用个人数据的调查后，对 ChatGPT 制造商 OpenAI 罚款 1500 万欧元（合 1558 万美元）。【原文：Italy's privacy watchdog said on Friday it fined ChatGPT maker OpenAI 15 million euros ($15.58 million) after closing an investigation into use of personal data by the generative artificial intelligence application.】

item.title: 解说员：特朗普瞄准拜登的《降低通货膨胀法案》：电动汽车、清洁能源和制造业
item.description: 当选总统唐纳德-特朗普誓言要废除乔-拜登的标志性气候法案--《通货膨胀削减法案》，该法案最初旨在通过约 4000 亿美元的新支出、减税和信贷来加速美国向绿色能源经济的转型。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump has vowed to repeal Joe Biden's signature climate bill called the Inflation Reduction Act, which initially aimed at some $400 billion in new spending and tax cuts and credits at accelerating America's transition to a green energy economy.】

item.title: 美国股市连年繁荣，投资者希望在 2025 年实现三连胜
item.description: 受支撑企业利润的稳健经济、缓和的利率以及即将上任的总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的支持增长政策的推动，投资者预计 2025 年美国股市将取得更多涨幅。【原文：Investors are expecting more gains for the U.S. stock market in 2025 after two straight standout years, fueled by a solid economy supporting corporate profits, moderating interest rates and pro-growth policies from incoming president Donald Trump.】

item.title: 美国液化天然气出口工厂的天然气需求将出现 8 年来首次下降
item.description: 今年，美国用于生产液化天然气（LNG）以供出口的天然气需求量将出现自八年前美国开始从低纬度 48 个州出口这种超冷燃料以来的首次下降。【原文：Demand for U.S. natural gas to produce liquefied natural gas (LNG) for export this year is headed for its first decline since the country started exporting the super-chilled fuel from the lower 48 states eight years ago.】

item.title: 在美国做出投资决定之前，哥伦比亚埃克石油公司的动荡加剧了对利润的担忧
item.description: 哥伦比亚总统古斯塔沃-彼得罗（Gustavo Petro）涉嫌干预国有控股公司哥伦比亚石油公司（Ecopetrol），并清洗了数百名员工为亲政府的接替者让路，这加剧了人们对该能源公司未来利润和对经济贡献的担忧。【原文：Alleged interference by Colombian President Gustavo Petro in majority state-owned Ecopetrol and purges of hundreds of staff to make way for pro-government replacements are fueling fears about the energy company's future profits and contributions to the economy.】

item.title: 华尔街一周前瞻 投资者期待 "圣诞老人 "反弹，股市却失去动力
item.description: 12 月迄今为止，美国股市在本该辉煌的一年中取得了 "守财奴 "般的回报，投资者希望 2024 年的尾声能带来一些节日的欢乐，但同时也对潜在的不利因素发出了警告。【原文：With December so far delivering Scrooge-like returns in an otherwise stellar year for U.S. stocks, investors hope the tail end of 2024 offers some holiday cheer, but warn of potential headwinds.】

item.title: 早间竞价：政府停摆和关税担忧扰乱年末市场
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 禽流感促使美国鸡蛋价格在圣诞节前创下历史新高
item.description: 随着蛋鸡禽流感疫情的加速爆发，美国鸡蛋批发价格不断刷新纪录，供应量锐减，而购物者则购买更多鸡蛋来烘焙圣诞饼干和其他节日食品。【原文：U.S. wholesale egg prices are shattering records as an accelerating outbreak of bird flu in laying hens slashes supplies while shoppers buy more to bake Christmas cookies and other holiday treats.】

item.title: 特斯拉 2024 年的交付量增长可能取决于马斯克的非正统 Cybertruck
item.description: 分析师表示，特斯拉的目标是在2024年通过对其电动汽车的慷慨激励，使交付量比去年略有增长，但这在很大程度上取决于新款Cybertruck皮卡的成功与否，而这款皮卡正显示出疲软的迹象。【原文：Tesla is aiming to post slight growth in 2024 deliveries over last year with generous incentives across its EVs - but a lot depends on the success of the new Cybertruck pickup, which is showing signs of weakness, analysts said.】

item.title: 欧盟准备加强与美国的关系，重点关注能源领域
item.description: 欧盟发言人周五表示，欧盟已准备好与美国当选总统特朗普讨论进一步加强经济关系的问题，包括能源领域的共同利益。【原文：The EU is ready to discuss further strengthening economic ties with U.S. President-elect Trump, including common interests in the energy sector, an EU spokesperson said on Friday, adding the EU was also committed to phasing out energy imports from Russia and diversifying supply sources.】

item.title: 欧盟批准英伟达收购 Run:ai
item.description: 欧盟委员会周五表示，已无条件批准英伟达以 7 亿美元收购 Run:ai。【原文：The European Commission said on Friday it has approved unconditionally Nvidia's $700 million bid for Run:ai.】

item.title: 诺和诺德新一代肥胖症药物 CagriSema 的减重效果低于预期
item.description: 诺和诺德公司周五表示，其试验性下一代肥胖症药物CagriSema在一项后期试验中帮助超重患者减轻了22.7%的体重，低于其预期的25%，这导致其股价大幅下跌。【原文：Novo Nordisk said on Friday its experimental next-generation obesity drug CagriSema helped overweight patients cut their weight by 22.7% in a late-stage trial, below the 25% it had expected, sending its shares down sharply.】

item.title: 通胀数据公布前，政府关门担忧打击期指
item.description: 周五，美国股指期货下跌，原因是投资者在一份关键的通胀报告公布之前，正努力应对政府关门的可能性和提高利率的路径。【原文：U.S. stock index futures dropped on Friday as investors grappled with the possibility of a government shutdown and a higher interest rate path ahead of a key inflation report.】

item.title: 特斯拉因胎压监测系统问题在美国召回近 70 万辆汽车
item.description: 特斯拉周五表示，因轮胎压力监控系统问题，将在美国召回694304辆汽车。【原文：Tesla said on Friday it was recalling 694,304 vehicles in the United States over an issue with the tire pressure monitoring system.】

item.title: 耐克新任首席执行官计划在品牌改革中返璞归真
item.description: 耐克新任首席执行官埃利奥特-希尔（Elliott Hill）警告说，这家运动服装巨头的销售复苏之路还很漫长，但这位资深高管提出的将重点转向篮球和跑步等运动的计划，缓解了一些投资者的担忧。【原文：Nike's new CEO Elliott Hill warned of a long road to sales recovery for the sportswear giant, but the veteran executive's plan to turn the spotlight on sports like basketball and running, allayed some investor worries.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，在日产与本田合并谈判之际，富士康对日产的兴趣被搁置
item.description: 彭博新闻社周五援引知情人士的话报道称，台湾富士康正在暂停对日产汽车的兴趣，因为这家日本汽车制造商正在探索与本田汽车合并的可能性。【原文：Taiwan's Foxconn is pausing its interest in Nissan Motor as the Japanese automaker explores a potential merger with Honda Motor , Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 瑞士调查谴责瑞信监管失误，但将大部分责任归咎于老板
item.description: 在这份期待已久的长达 569 页的报告中，立法者们揭露了瑞士不习惯接受监督的官僚作风，斥责监管机构神秘、不信任，对 2023 年 3 月导致该银行倒闭的危机的反应有时过于草率。【原文：In a long-awaited 569-page report, lawmakers exposed Swiss bureaucracy that is unaccustomed to scrutiny, rebuking regulators for being secretive and mistrustful, and for responding at times haphazardly to the crisis that felled the bank in March 2023.】

item.title: 神秘的瑞士人如何试图掩盖瑞士信贷危机
item.description: 一份报告揭示了瑞士政府中心的保密文化。【原文：A report reveals a culture of secrecy at the centre of Switzerland's government.】

item.title: 瑞士关于瑞士信贷倒闭的调查结果
item.description: 瑞士周五公布了一份期待已久的议会报告，内容涉及去年瑞士信贷银行的倒闭，这一事件使瑞士金融稳定的声誉受到质疑，并引发了有关出错原因的深远问题。【原文：Switzerland on Friday published a long-awaited parliamentary report into last year's collapse of Credit Suisse, an event that called into question the country's reputation for financial stability and prompted far-reaching questions about what went wrong.】

item.title: 澳大利亚证券交易所（ASX）在 CHESS 软件故障后推迟结算
item.description: 澳大利亚证券交易所（ASX）周五表示，由于其清算所电子分登记系统（CHESS）软件发生故障，且无法解决问题，该交易所将把当天的结算推迟到下周一。【原文：Australian bourse operator ASX will defer the day's settlements to Monday after its Clearing House Electronic Subregister System (CHESS) software broke down and it was unable to resolve issues, it said on Friday.】

item.title: 解说员：什么是可可期货？
item.description: 2024 年，期货市场的可可价格创下了历史新高，而提供大量流动资金的对冲基金的退出加剧了可可价格的飙升。【原文：Futures markets have seen a record-breaking run in cocoa prices in 2024, a surge exacerbated by the hedge funds that provide much of their liquidity heading for the exit.】

item.title: 对冲基金出逃如何重塑全球可可市场
item.description: 在可可价格今年创下历史新高的背后，推动巧克力成本的金融市场一角发生了巨大变化：为其运作提供资金支持的对冲基金纷纷退出。【原文：Behind a record surge in cocoa prices this year, a corner of financial markets that drives the cost of chocolate underwent a seismic shift: the hedge funds that oiled its workings headed for the exit.】

item.title: 消息人士称大众汽车与工会在工资谈判中关系缓和
item.description: 周五，接近谈判的消息人士告诉路透社记者，大众汽车与 IG Metall 工会就薪酬和工作保障问题进行了有史以来最长的谈判，双方关系有所缓和，但没有提供更多细节。【原文：There has been rapprochement between Volkswagen and the IG Metall union during the longest-ever talks over pay and job security, sources close to the negotiations told Reuters on Friday, without providing further details.】

item.title: 特朗普称欧盟应通过购买美国石油和天然气弥补对美 "巨大赤字
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周五表示，欧盟必须购买美国石油和天然气以弥补其与世界最大经济体之间的 "巨大赤字"，否则将面临关税。【原文：U.S. President-elect Donald Trump said on Friday that the European Union must purchase U.S. oil and gas to make up for its "tremendous deficit" with the world's largest economy, or face tariffs.】

item.title: 奢侈品牌大量生产低价商品，以吸引中产阶级购物者
item.description: 面对包括 3,000 美元及以上的手袋和 4,000 美元及以上的羊绒夹克在内的常规商品需求的普遍下降，设计师和奢侈品的主要销售商正在拓宽产品线，主打价格在 500 美元及以下的围巾、腰带、钱包和家居用品。【原文：Confronting a broad decline in demand for their usual fare, including $3,000-and-up handbags and $4,000-and-up cashmere jackets, major marketers of designer and luxury merchandise are broadening their product lines to emphasize scarves, belts, wallets and home goods priced at $500 and under.】

item.title: 欧洲私募股权基金面临退出难题，更大的交易在招手
item.description: 银行家和投资者表示，欧洲的私募股权基金尽管现金充裕，但在购买可能难以出售的企业时仍要三思而后行，并在进行更多收购之前仔细制定退出计划。【原文：Private equity funds in Europe, even though flush with cash, are thinking twice about buying businesses that could be difficult to sell and carefully working through their exit plans before making more acquisitions, bankers and investors said.】

item.title: 早间竞标今年还有最后一关
item.description: Stella Qiu 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Stella Qiu】

item.title: MUFG 美洲首席执行官表示，即使在特朗普执政期间，人工智能数据中心也将促进可再生能源需求
item.description: 日本最大的银行集团三菱日联金融集团（Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group）美洲分部负责人表示，即使在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）即将上任的政府执政期间，美国向可再生能源的广泛转变仍将继续。【原文：The broad shift towards renewable energy in the U.S. will continue even under the incoming administration of Donald Trump, said the head of the Americas arm of Japan's largest banking group, Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group .】

item.title: 欧盟协议和特朗普关税威胁促进南方共同市场贸易谈判
item.description: 外交官们说，在与欧盟达成协议后，巴西希望南美贸易集团南方共同市场加快更多的自由贸易谈判，因为美国关税的威胁迫使各国出口选择多样化。【原文：Brazil expects the South American trade bloc Mercosur to speed up more free trade negotiations after clinching a deal with the European Union, as the threat of U.S. tariffs forces countries to diversify their options for exports, diplomats say.】
